title: Plan a Game Server Merge
description: Two game servers with low player populations need to be merged to improve the matchmaking experience.

tasks.description: Analyze the player population trends for all servers to identify the best candidates for merging.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies two specific servers with consistently low populations.

tasks.description: Check for any potential conflicts, such as players with the same name on both servers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of name conflicts that will need to be resolved.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed project plan for the server merge, including communication to players, downtime, and the conflict resolution process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive plan for the merge.
